channel.title: Pickup problems
channel.description:
A lot of people have this too.
I type ::pickup 00995 500000,
nothing.
Its in the client.java, just doesn't work on Summon-Pkz

item.description:

try not adding the extra 0… not sure since you didnt put up your pickup command.

item.title: Pickup problems

item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

move your pickup command above every other command it means you tryed to leech the server and changed the names of the people who could use some commands to the name you wanted and messed up somewhwre/

item.title: Pickup problems
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Make your player rights the requested, or just add this;

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights == 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { } } catch (Exception e) { } }

Read full topic
